summary: THE ANTI-SLIP RESISTANCE LIGHT COMES ON, INDICATING IT'S NOT ACTIVATED, WHILE DRIVING.  CAR JOLTS, WHICH MEANS IT DOES DECELERATION AND SUDDEN ACCELERATION.  THE BATTERY LIGHT COMES ON WHILE IN REVERSE.  CAR TOTALLY DIES WHEN THIS HAPPENS, DRIVER CAN DO NOTHING EXCEPT BRAKE, IT MEANS NOT STEERING AT ALL.
